text: jyare tame temane jo'i lo to temana sarira tamane sanadara lage che, a loko jyare vato karava lage to tame temani vato sambhalo, jemake te'o divalana teke rakheli lakadi'o che, dareka (sakhata) avajane potana virudhdha samaje che, a ja kharekhara dusmano che, temanathi baco, allaha te'one nasta kare, kayam avala pheravavamam avi rahya che
